commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, there you are, Rina! Hey, are you free this weekend?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. Is something going on?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We're all going to go hang out at Honoka's house, want to come? Everyone from Î¼'s and Aqours is going to be there.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Everyone'll be there?! I wanna go!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All right, that makes everyone. I wonder if Honoka and Chika are doing all right?

commands.ef_arg: 1 play ||Same Day, Uranohoshi Girls' High School||

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Can Honoka's home really entertain so many guests?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Don't worry, Honoka was eager to have us all over!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I see. Well, if Honoka said so.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Honoka's house is a famous Japanese bakery, right? I wonder if we can have some nice traditional treats there.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Traditional treats, huh? I want some, too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I think she'll have some for us!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Sweet, zura!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Heh heh heh... All right, that's everyone here accounted for. All according to plan!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Plan?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? O-Oh, uh, nothing! Don't worry about it.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: How terribly suspicious. Say, what are we all doing at Honoka's, anyway?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: W-Well, er. Ah. Ahaha.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Well, that's fine. We'll find out when we get there.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah, that's the spirit!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Phew! That was a close one.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Suspicious. Very suspicious.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What? C'mon, I'm not suspicious at all. It's just because you came out and said something weird, ahaha.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It's terrifying how bad an actor you are. You really think you can pull one over on me like that? Now come on, out with the truth! What are you plotting?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I'm telling you, I'm not plotting anything.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Look me right in the eyes and say that.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Er. Ah. Ahaha.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Your eyes are all over the place! You're up to no good, aren't you?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hey, it's not "no good"!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I knew you were plotting something! Come on, talk, what are you doing with a group this large?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: E-Er, well. Everyone wants to level up as school idols, so they asked to have you teach them.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: They want to study up about school idols? Hmph. A pretty good stance, I'll give them that. In that case, I'll oblige everyone.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ph-Phew, that takes care of everyone here. There's no time, we have to split up and get ready!
